description:
#1 FREE GAME in countries on the AppStore with over 3 Million Downloads!!

UPDATE: Legend of the Cryptids is now compatible and fully supported on the iPad - Enjoy the STUNNING artwork on a larger screen!

*Devices running version 5.1.1 and lower are currently unsupported.
Please update to the latest version to enjoy all the features of LOC.


■□■NEW PLAYER CAMPAIGN■□■
NOW, you can get a REWARD (worth $25) after clearing the Tutorial!!

Legend of the Cryptids is a free-to-play and highly addictive epic fantasy MMORPG battle card game!

Don't just take our word for it. Here's what actual users have said about Legend of the Cryptids:

■■■■■ ”By far the most addicting and beats all card games the available on the iPhone!”

■■■■■ ”Extraordinary artwork and gameplay. This app is awesome and addicting! Once you start you won't stop!”

■■■■■ ”I love this game! It’s not as complex as other card games with trap and spell cards. It’s all about your monsters abilities and attributes.”


[Game Insight]

●Over 300 visually stunning creature cards available to create your very own powerful deck!
●Train Cryptids and challenge other players to “Battles”!
●Explore over 25 exotic fantasy locales! 
●Over 100 additional quests available with every event. 
●Collect treasure and steal it from other players before they set their sights on yours!
●Combine forces with other heroes and create the world's strongest guild!
●Invite friends and make your guild even stronger!
●Full-color visuals and dazzling animations!
●Original fantasy music soundtrack!
●And much more!


PLEASE NOTE: By playing 'Legend of the Cryptids', you may find yourself hopelessly addicted to getting your Cryptids stronger, looking at them fantastically change after evolving, or participating in events and defeating the bosses one after another to get special rare cards and items. You may find yourself collecting marvelous cards of various types: Humanoids, Fairies, Demons, and Dragons, in addition to finding yourself assembling your favorite cards and building a team to fight against other players!

Install Legend of the Cryptids today. It's now free!

-------------------------------------
LIKE US! on Facebook Page : http://goo.gl/zds7d
You'll be able to obtain exclusive rewards and special tips!

FOLLOW US! on Twitter : http://goo.gl/lAkrf


Thank you for playing!

Legend of the Cryptids Support
